Brakes, Air 04

ABS ELECTRONIC CONTROL MODULE, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R trim panel(s) when required

Excludes:
1. ABS SYSTEM, DIAGNOSTICS (ELECTRONIC)

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A04-3900 Models, ALL 0.5

3. R&R brake shoes
4. R&R brake shoe return and retaining springs
5. R&R brake slack adjuster
6. Adjust wheel bearings and check/fill lube
7. Adjust brakes on axle being serviced
